channel.title: The Castle of Lightwood (sign up thread)
channel.description:
**Backstory**
All over the kingdom, sighting of persons having strange powers multiply. The king seems to be neutral about it for the moment, but the act of those powerful people could change his perspective about it. You are one of those gifted people. You came to his castle, But you need to be cautious now. The kings guard is suspicious about the new powers and search for powerful persons in the court. How will you change the kingdom? Will you show how dangerous the powers are or that they have good purpose? Or are you just there for the power, and want to take the crown by yourself?
**This is a signup thread: send the character you want to the GMs (ksundheit or sad snake).** 1. **No OP characters:** It's not fun for a character to be impossible to beat, particularely if you side against them. 2. To prevent confusion, **the numbers of character should be 1 each**. you can create a second one with the GMs accord. 3. **The general rules apply here too.**
**Here's the signup format:**
**Age :** **power:** **backstory:** **combat modifiers = (your skills in combat. minimum -4 / maximum +4.)** **willpower modfiers = (your intellect/immunity to mindcontrol/etc... minimum -4, maximum +4)** **The modifiers will be used when solving fights using rolls, but you are able to fight using only RP actions, when everyone involved agrees**
Modifiers will be changed if they seem to be too strong.
Be sure to leave any feedback here, as this is our first time organising a roleplay thread.

item.title: The Castle of Lightwood (sign up thread)
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description:
/join
Age:~12
Power:low grade magic and ghost communication through her brother
Backstory: early on brother and parents died, and she took a memento of her bro. Her parents were magical and some witch (she did not know she was a witch) took her in and homes her powers a bit before also dying. Now she wanders the forest not getting attached to any one, afraid they’ll die too. She does not have a name, because it’s tradition in her family that no one gets a name until they’ve done a task (they are not told the task until they’ve done it.)
Modifiers:
Physical combat: -4 (she’s a little girl that’s a bit malnourished and dressed in rags)
Magical combat: +3.5
Intellect: +2 (+3.5 when angered; recessed, instictual knowlege)
Mind control resistance: -3.5 (trauma;she thinks she killed her parents/Matilda(the witch)
Simon (her brother who “haunts her”)
Age: 8/infinity (16 years worth of wisdom and maturity)
Modifiers
Physical combat attack: +3 (can haunt objects and throw them around
Physical combat defense: effectively infinite because he’s a ghost, and only the form can see him
Magical combat: +0 (when with the girl, gives the girl a second chance of her attack to hit/her to dodge/otherwise not be hurt)

(Oh yeah. /ressurect old thread)

Read full topic
item.source: The Castle of Lightwood (sign up thread)
